main_features.description: Manage PostgreSQL database through a web-based interface.
Define data models for tasks using SQLAlchemy.
Provide REST API endpoints to manage Call for Tenders data.
Create a dashboard to monitor and analyze Call for Tenders data.
Scrape the index of EU calls for proposals using Scrapy framework.

technical_stack.description: Framework for extracting data from websites using a simple and scalable architecture.

validation_error.description: The error is due to the 'declarative_base' function not being imported.
validation_error.solution: Import 'Base' from 'sqlalchemy.ext.declarative' at the beginning of 'app/models.py'.
